content:
# I have successfully crafted 1 Stone Furnace! My inventory now contains 1 Stone Furnace, 10 coal, and 6 stone.

# Next, I need to place the Stone Furnace in a suitable location. I will move to a position where I can place the furnace, ideally near a resource patch for future smelting operations.

# I will find a suitable position to place the Stone Furnace, preferably close to the coal resource I gathered from earlier.

furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Find a valid position to place the furnace
move_to(furnace_position)  # Move to the chosen position
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the Stone Furnace
print(f"Entities after placing the furnace: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities after placing the furnace
